title: 关于cc菜单玩家无法正常打开
author: TXT-2191
txt_content:
权限组配置文件：
我已经把权限写了不知道为什么还是没权限 
Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - chestcommands.open.menu.yml
    - chestcommands.item.menu.yml
    - chestcommands.command.open
    - chestcommands.opem.petmanager.yml
    - chestcommands.opem.petunlock.yml
    - chestcommands.opem.gs.yml
    - chestcommands.opem.cc1.yml
    - chestcommands.open.baoshi.yml
    - chestcommands.open.cd.yml
    - chestcommands.open.cs.yml
    - chestcommands.open.cuilian.yml
    - chestcommands.open.example.yml
    - BoxPage.1.1
    - chestcommands.open.jj.yml
    - chestcommands.open.simple-shop.yml
    - chestcommands.open.simple-shop1.yml
    - chestcommands.open.viplb.yml
    - chestcommnads.open.kf.yml
    - chestcommands.open.fuben.yml
    - chestcommands.open.qx.yml
    - ChestTrade.InterTrade
    - ChestTrade.use
    - gj.on
    - TreasureHunt.use.openChest
    - epicguild.create
    - essentails.kit.mr

    - essentials.build

    - marry.chat
    - marry.gender
    - marry.gift
    - marry.home

    - marry.marry

    - plotme.limit.1

    - plotme.use

    - plotme.use.remove

    - quickshop.buy
    - quickshop.create.buy
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - quickshop.sell
    - quickshop.use
    - RandomLocation.Use
    - BoxPage.1

    - g:towny_builder

replies.author: smiledada
replies.txt_content:
chestcommands.open.menu.yml
这里的menu是钟表菜单的名字，比如你的钟表名字是caidan就需要给玩家chestcommands.open.caidan.yml这个命令

replies.author: 向文
replies.txt_content:
老哥打错字了 
n打成m了
